page.title: 15A teenager's Saturday
page.content: I start my day at 7:30 am.I get out of bed,wash & dress,then I go to the kitchen for breakfast & a cup of tea or glass of orange juice.I then go down to the chickens & geese and let them out. At about 9:45am I go to my piano lesson which is half an hour long.then Mum picks me up ,I go home change into my best clothes & go to town.I usually meet friends in town & go around with them for about 2 hours.Then Mum either picks me up or I walk home.When I get home I clean my bedroom. After I clean my room I have my dinner which is usually a sandwich and a cup of coffee . Then I wake Burtrude (hamster) up and clean out his cage. I get tea and then take the dogs out.In the evening I watch T.V and go to bed at 11:30pm.
